divs: Sighting Detailsco-worker and I saw the same strange orb as reported several weeks ago in the same place same colors, object hovered for a bit then slowly move away heading west. the colors were orange and yellow would get brighter then get dimmer it would move slowly up and down then just slowly moved on.
